title: Green hydrogen hype fades as high costs force project retreat
description: High costs are hindering the development of green hydrogen, leading companies to cancel projects and reduce investments. Origin Energy's cancellation in Australia exemplifies broader industry struggles. Production of clean hydrogen is increasing but remains a small fraction of global demand, highlighting economic and technological challenges.
